General.Name: Guangdong Marubi Biotechnology Co
General.Description: Guangdong Marubi Biotechnology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, production, sale, and service of various cosmetics in China. The company provides skin care, make up, and eye care products. It offers its products under the Marubi, Lianhuo, Chunji, and the Love Fire brand names. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Guangzhou, China.
General.Address: South Tower, Polyway Building, Guangzhou, China, 510000

1.Name: Mr. Kaihui  Wang
1.Title: CFO, Sec. & Director, Sec. of the Board
